description: This simple and mild jackfruit curry is ready in minutes, perfect for a vegan Indian feast.
keywords: Indian curry,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Plant-based,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Tomato,Spinach,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Jackfruit & Spinach Curry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 bunch coriander, fresh, chopped stalks included

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil and cook the onions for 10 minutes. Stir in the garlic and ginger paste, green chilli and spices and cook for 3-4 minutes. Add the tomatoes and coriander stalks and cook for 4 minutes, until the tomatoes begin to break down.
Add the jackfruit to the pan and cook for 2 minutes. Pour over the coconut milk, reduced the heat and simmer for 3 minutes. Stir in the spinach and simmer for 3 minutes, until wilted.
Add more water if necessary and serve with fresh coriander on top and lime wedges on the side, if desired.
